page.title: 04RTK BOATYARD
page.content: { This boatyard builds boats and hovercraft which go all over the world. The boatyard was founded during the war and was modernized in 1977 when{RTK}took over. It covers about 7.5 acres and about 300 boats can be stored there. About 40 people are employed there. They clean, repair, build and launch boats - it takes about 10 weeks for an average sized{boat}to be built, usually from{moulds. }They also make and sell the{Tiger 4 and 12 {hovercraft. }There is a big workshop, moulding shop and offices. The boats are built for{private, {industrial}and{military}purposes. Most are{exported. }Only about 1 in 100 stays in Britain.
